metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2497 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 12.6 before 15.0.5, all versions starting from 15.1 before15.1.4, all versions starting from 15.2 before 15.2.1. A maliciousdeveloper could exfiltrate an integration's access token by modifying theintegration URL such that authenticated requests are sent to an attackercontrolled server.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
